Then the kicker comes out that the wife was taking birthcontrol pills all along while guilt tripping the husband into why they couldn't have children. @TheJackDaw yeah the very definition of NTR is to have a loved one stolen, and it doesn't have to be someone you love in a sexual way like having your sister/mother/brother/father stolen is also NTR. It could also be having you gf's virginity taken by someone else. But in short it's cheating but applies to anyone you love not just your lover/spouse and ends with them being stolen in someway.

There are some as you mention stories where the ending is happy? But thats not the standard NTR ending. For instance there is one where a gf is raped and then blackmailed by a guy then in the last chapter the bf and the guys mom walks in, guy tries to defend himself that the gf seduced him but no one believes him and the bf and gf get's a happy ending, not sure if I read the raw of this one or it was translated.

The second one is this:

Both of these have NTR in them, but legitimately happy endings.  There are more, but I'm lazy.
